markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Mental Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6119) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 157 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Arcane Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6094) or [Occult Evolution](/Feats.aspx?ID=6096)

</column>

---

Your bloodline's deep connection to mental essence greatly enhances your spell repertoire. Add one spell to your spell repertoire for each spell rank you can cast.
name: Greater Mental Evolution
